title: Guided by the Stars
description: During a trip to Greece, Nora and Adriane find themselves caught in the middle of an age-old battle for dominance.The last of an ancient lineage, the power in their blood acts like a beacon to those who seek to control them. Taken and separated by two sinful Demigods, the girls must navigate new realms and abilities to survive. The longer they stay trapped, the stronger the bond with their captors becomes. Despite the growing connection, danger surrounds them.It’s not just a fight for their lives. It’s one for their hearts.Can they escape with both?***Guided by the Stars, the first of the Creating Destiny duet, is a Greek Mythology romance with themes that may be triggering to some readers.***
author: Anna Friesz
